page.title: 19MASTER AND MRS. AVERAGE
page.content: The average pocket money of a 10-11year old is 90pence.About 50% of the children save theirs;although most have no specific idea what they are saving for.Of those who don't save,about 80% spent their pocket money on sweets,with comics and items for hobbies(fishing,knitting),and sports(swimming).Their favourite sweets are chocolate and bubble-gum.Their favourite comic is the Beano. They use the village playing field about three times a week, and watch about three hours television each evening.Nearly all children have a bicycle, and both boys and girl prefer jeans to any other clothes.The girls heroes are usually Pop stars,and the boys favour film stars(male).There most treasured possessions seem to be pets,jewelry and computers.
